result.synopsis: Anna, Elsa, Kristoff, Olaf and Sven leave Arendelle to travel to an ancient, autumn-bound forest of an enchanted land. They set out to find the origin of Elsa's powers in order to save their kingdom.
result.writers: Jennifer Lee (screenplay by), Jennifer Lee (story by)

result.synopsis: A detective investigates the death of a patriarch of an eccentric, combative family.

American car designer Carroll Shelby and driver Ken Miles battle corporate interference, the laws of physics and their own personal demons to build a revolutionary race car for Ford and challenge Ferrari at the 24 Hours of Le Mans in 1966.
A couple's first date takes an unexpected turn when a police officer pulls them over.
result.writers: Lena Waithe (screenplay by), James Frey (story by)

result.judul: A Beautiful Day in the Neighborhood (2019)
result.synopsis: Based on the true story of a real-life friendship between Fred Rogers and journalist Tom Junod.
An embattled NYPD detective is thrust into a citywide manhunt for a pair of cop killers after uncovering a massive and unexpected conspiracy.

Kate is a young woman subscribed to bad decisions. Working as an elf in a year round Christmas store is not good for the wannabe singer. However, she meets Tom there. Her life takes a new turn. For Kate, it seems too good to be true.
result.writers: Emma Thompson (story by), Greg Wise (story by)

result.synopsis: In Gotham City, mentally troubled comedian Arthur Fleck is disregarded and mistreated by society. He then embarks on a downward spiral of revolution and bloody crime. This path brings him face-to-face with his alter-ego: the Joker.
